snippet: The city of North Miami and the board of the Museum of Contemporary Art there cannot agree on the museum’s future, leaving it in limbo.
abstract: Bitter conflict has erupted between North Miami, Fla, and its Museum of Contemporary Art; museum's board wants to leave city and merge with Bass Museum of Art in wealthier Miami Beach, saying North Miami has neglected museum building; North Miami officials accuse museum of plotting to make off with city's cultural patrimony.
lead_paragraph: The city of North Miami and the board of the Museum of Contemporary Art there cannot agree on the museum’s future, leaving it in limbo.

headline.main: North Miami Fights to Keep Its Art Museum
headline.print_headline: North Miami Fights to Keep Its Art Museum
